title: ASB launches on 5/28
custom_preconds: Given you are viewing the ASB
custom_steps: When the date is before 5/28/2019
custom_expected: The ballot is closed.

title: Confirm existence of ASB logo
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the ASB Logo
custom_expected: Then it exists

title: ASB logo is updated to show 2019
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the ASB logo
custom_expected: Then it is updated to 2019

title: ASB reflects 2019 endpoint
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When checking the endpoints
custom_expected: Then the ballot reflects the 2019 endpoint:  http://betacontent.mlb.com/mlb/en/event/v1/asg2018/asgBallot/web-v1.json

title: About the Ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When the user selects 'About the Ballot'
custom_expected: Then the user is displayed the 2019 'About the Ballot' text.

title: Official sponsor of the ASB shows as Google
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the sponsor of the 2019 ballot
custom_expected: Then the sponsor of the 2019 ballot is Google

title: Official title shows: Google MLB All-Star Ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the official title
custom_expected: Then the official title shows [sponsor name] MLB All-Star Ballot

title: MLB Vanity URL is mlb.com/vote
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the Vanity URL
custom_expected: Then the Vanity URL is mlb.com/vote

title: Club Vanity URL is *club*.com/vote
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the Club Vanity site
custom_expected: Then Club Vanity URL is *club*.com/vote

title: Captcha is required prior to submission**
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When attempting to submit the ballot without the required Captcha
custom_expected: Then the user is unable to submit the ballot

title: ASG Ballot is responsive in all viewports and devices
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the ballot on any device in any viewport
custom_expected: Then the ballot is fully responsive

title: ASG Ballot is accessible on standard web platforms**
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When using accessibility features on standard web platforms
custom_expected: Then ASG Ballot is accessible on standard web platforms

title: User can select one player per position and up to three players for OF
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is selecting players
custom_expected: Then the user can select one player per position and up to three players for OF

title: User must submit at least one player to submit the ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When attempting to submit the ballot
custom_expected: Then the user must submit at least one player to submit the ballot

title: User can vote up to 5 times per day (reset 11:59pm local time) **
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When user votes up to 5 times per day (reset 11:59pm local time)
custom_expected: Then the user is not allowed to vote again until 12:00 am the next day when it resets

title: Write-in: Players already represented on the ballot do not appear in predictive search
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When attempting to write-in a player already represented on the ballot
custom_expected: Then the player does not appear in the predictive search

title: Write-in: Predictive search only include active players not included on the ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When attempting to write-in a non active player
custom_expected: Then Predictive search only includes active players not included on the ballot

title: Write-in: Players cannot be written in for more than one position
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the ASG Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is writing in a player
custom_expected: Then Players cannot be written in for more than one position

title: Ensure the `underage` cookies isn't being set to `true` on Kiosk Mode."

custom_steps: When user votes for selected players and navigates to same link again
custom_expected: Then the browser cookie will be set to empty value (normally set to "true")

custom_steps: When user clicks submit and review
custom_expected: Then the page is reloaded (after 5 seconds)

Given the user navigates to https://beta-aws.mlb.com/all-star/ballot
AND
https://beta-aws.mlb.com/es/all-star/ballot 
AND
https://beta-aws.mlb.com/all-star/ballot?kiosk=true&venue=nym
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the MLB All Star Ballot page
custom_expected: Then the page renders correctly and the user is able submit a vote.
